contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox City Japan |Name= Mizuho |JapaneseName= 瑞穂市 |MapImage=Mizuho in Gifu Prefecture.png |Region= [[Chūbu region|Chūbu]] |Prefecture= [[Gifu Prefecture|Gifu]] |District= |Area_km2= 28.19 |PopDate=July 2011<ref name=GifuEstimate>{{cite web|title=岐阜県の人口・世帯数人口動態統計調査結果|url=http://www.pref.gifu.lg.jp/kensei-unei/tokeijoho/kohyoshiryo/jinko-jutaku/jinko/2011/jinko201108.data/H2308kohyo.xls|work=Gifu prefectural website|publisher=Gifu Prefecture|accessdate=September 11, 2011|language=Japanese}}</ref> |Population=52,269 |Density_km2=auto |Coords={{coord|35|24|N|136|41|E|region:JP_type:city}} |LatitudeDegrees = 35 |LatitudeMinutes = 24 |LatitudeSeconds = |LongtitudeDegrees = 136 |LongtitudeMinutes = 41 |LongtitudeSeconds = |Tree=[[Sakura]] |Flower=[[Hydrangea]] |Bird= |SymbolImage= Flag of Mizuho Gifu.JPG |SymbolDescription= |Mayor= Takamasa Hori (since June 2007) |CityHallPostalCode=501-0293 |CityHallAddress=1288 Beppu, Mizuho-shi, Gifu-ken |CityHallPhone=058-327-4130 |CityHallLink=[http://www.city.mizuho.lg.jp/ City of Mizuho] }} {{nihongo|'''Mizuho'''|瑞穂市|Mizuho-shi}} is a [[cities of Japan|city]] located in [[Gifu Prefecture]], [[Japan]]. As of July 2011, the city has an estimated [[population]] of 52,269, with the number of [[household]]s being 19,567. The total area is 28.19 km².<ref name=enkaku>{{cite web|title=位置・沿革|url=http://www.city.mizuho.lg.jp/mizuho/gaiyou/symbol/p-1360.html|work=Mizuho official website|accessdate=11 August 2011}}</ref> ==Geography== ===Adjacent Cities and Towns=== *Cities of [[Gifu, Gifu|Gifu]], [[Ōgaki, Gifu|Ōgaki]] and [[Motosu, Gifu|Motosu]] *Towns of [[Kitagata, Gifu|Kitagata]] ([[Motosu District, Gifu|Motosu District]]) and [[Anpachi, Gifu|Anpachi]] and [[Gōdo, Gifu|Gōdo]] ([[Anpachi District, Gifu|Anpachi District]]) ==History== The city was established on May 1, 2003, by the merger of the towns of {{nihongo|''Hozumi''|穂積}} and {{nihongo|''Sunami''|巣南}},<ref name=enkaku /> both from [[Motosu District, Gifu|Motosu District]]. ==Educational institutions== ===Universities, Colleges=== *[[Asahi University]] ==Transportation== ===Railways=== *[[Central Japan Railway Company]] **[[Tōkaidō Main Line]]: [[Hozumi Station]] *[[Tarumi Railway]] **Tarumi Line: [[Yokoya Station]], [[Jūkujō Station]], [[Mieji Station]] ===Highways=== *[[Japan National Route 21|National Route 21]] ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== {{Commons category-inline}} * [http://www.city.mizuho.lg.jp/ Mizuho official website] {{ja icon}} {{Gifu}} [[Category:Cities in Gifu Prefecture]] {{Gifu-geo-stub}}
